header: jp morgan chief says fed acted very wisely
body:
DAVOS, Switzerland (Reuters) - The decision by the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates on Tuesday showed the U.S. central bank is acting “very wisely”, the head of U.S. bank JPMorgan Chase & Co Inc said on Wednesday.

“I think the Fed is acting very wisely,” James Dimon told Reuters.

“It will help,” he said when asked if the move would restore confidence in falling financial markets.

For full coverage, blogs and TV from Davos see: here
